Question
========

If I make 4 independent draws from a normal distribution with expectation 20 and variance 64, then the mean of these 4 draws will have as its distribution:

Answerlist
----------

* N(0, 1)
* N(5, 22)
* N(20, 22)
* N(20, 42)

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* N(0, 1): Incorrect
* N(5, 22): Incorrect
* N(20, 22): Incorrect
* N(20, 42): Correct
